measured_by: number of optimal epochs (point of early stopping) during RNN training
justification: The article states: "We propose that the point of early stopping largely reflects the amount of noise in the data… an earlier stopping point indicates noisier data." This links the construct of behavioural noise to the optimal-epoch count in RNN training.

measured_by: predictive performance of a theory-independent recurrent neural network (RNN) compared with the theoretical model
justification: The authors note: "we demonstrated that the predictive performance of a pre-trained RNN… could be used to classify whether an agent was miss-specified by the lab's theoretical model." Hence, RNN predictive accuracy serves as the operational measure of model miss-specification.
